verses.verse: How long will you forget <S%H7911><s%> me <S%H3068><s%>, O Lord? for ever <S%H5331><s%>? how long will you hide <S%H5641><s%> your face from me <S%H6440><s%>?

How long shall I take <S%H7896><s%> counsel <S%H6098><s%> in my soul <S%H5315><s%>, having sorrow <S%H3015><s%> in my heart <S%H3824><s%> daily <S%H3119><s%>? how long shall my enemy <S%H341><s%> be exalted over me <S%H7311><s%>?
Consider <S%H5027><s%> and hear <S%H6030><s%> me <S%H3068><s%>, O Lord my God <S%H430><s%>: lighten <S%H215><s%> my eyes <S%H5869><s%>, lest I sleep <S%H3462><s%> the sleep of death <S%H4194><s%>;
Lest my enemy <S%H341><s%> say <S%H559><s%>, I have prevailed <S%H3201><s%> against him <S%H6862><s%>; and those that trouble me rejoice <S%H1523><s%> when I am moved <S%H4131><s%>.
But I have trusted <S%H982><s%> in your mercy <S%H2617><s%>; my heart <S%H3820><s%> shall rejoice <S%H1523><s%> in your salvation <S%H3444><s%>.
I will sing <S%H7891><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, because he has dealt bountifully with me <S%H1580><s%>.
